title: 昨天还好好的，突然玩不了MC，详情帖内附上。
author: Stukurios
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Stukurios 于 2013-7-11 13:53 编辑 

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----// You should try our sister game, Minceraft!
Time: 13-7-11 下午1:04Description: Failed to start game
java.lang.RuntimeException: javax.imageio.IIOException: Can't create cache file!at net.minecraft.client.gui.FontRenderer.func_98305_c(FontRenderer.java:167)at net.minecraft.client.gui.FontRenderer.func_98304_a(FontRenderer.java:151)at net.minecraft.client.gui.FontRenderer.<init>(FontRenderer.java:112)at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.func_71384_a(Minecraft.java:407)at net.minecraft.client.MinecraftAppletImpl.func_71384_a(SourceFile:56)at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:732)at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)Caused by: javax.imageio.IIOException: Can't create cache file!at javax.imageio.ImageIO.createImageInputStream(Unknown Source)at javax.imageio.ImageIO.read(Unknown Source)at net.minecraft.client.gui.FontRenderer.func_98305_c(FontRenderer.java:163)... 6 moreCaused by: java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException: E:\Minecraft 1.5.2 [客户端]\.minecraft\bin\MP6300~1\imageio1482707252303469760.tmpat sun.nio.fs.WindowsException.translateToIOException(Unknown Source)at sun.nio.fs.WindowsException.rethrowAsIOException(Unknown Source)at sun.nio.fs.WindowsException.rethrowAsIOException(Unknown Source)at sun.nio.fs.WindowsFileSystemProvider.newByteChannel(Unknown Source)at java.nio.file.Files.newByteChannel(Unknown Source)at java.nio.file.Files.createFile(Unknown Source)at java.nio.file.TempFileHelper.create(Unknown Source)at java.nio.file.TempFileHelper.createTempFile(Unknown Source)at java.nio.file.Files.createTempFile(Unknown Source)at javax.imageio.stream.FileCacheImageInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source)at com.sun.imageio.spi.InputStreamImageInputStreamSpi.createInputStreamInstance(Unknown Source)... 9 more

A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- System Details --Details:Minecraft Version: 1.5.2Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1Java Version: 1.7.0_21, Oracle CorporationJava VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode, sharing), Oracle CorporationMemory: 17819840 bytes (16 MB) / 76263424 bytes (72 MB) up to 259522560 bytes (247 MB)JVM Flags: 0 total; AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) usedSuspicious classes: FML and Forge are installedIntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0FML: LWJGL: 2.4.2OpenGL: AMD Radeon HD 6570 GL version 4.1.10666 Compatibility Profile Context, ATI Technologies Inc.Is Modded: Definitely; Client brand changed to 'fml,forge'Type: Client (map_client.txt)Texture Pack: 默认Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)Vec3 Pool Size: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null




求救中……

replies.author: YZC
replies.txt_content:
Stukurios 发表于 2013-7-12 01:02 
有，用了光影MOD。
可能有冲突，你删掉看看
